hero.description: Delicious liquid dietary supplement containing choline, rich multivitamin, and mineral complex. Specially formulated for children's healthy growth and development.

benefits.title: For Your Child's Healthy
benefits.description: Bravita's rich vitamin and mineral content supports children's normal growth and development.

immune.title: Immune System
immune.desc: Helps the normal function of the immune system with Vitamin C, Zinc, B6, Vitamin A, Selenium, Vitamin D, B12, Iron, and Folic Acid.

nervous.title: Nervous System
nervous.desc: Biotin, Niacin, Vitamin C, Iodine, Vitamins B1, B2, B6, and B12 contribute to the normal functioning of the nervous system.

energy.title: Energy Metabolism
energy.desc: Vitamin C, Niacin, Iron, Vitamins B2, B6, and B12 support normal energy-yielding metabolism and contribute to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue.

bone.title: Bone Development
bone.desc: Vitamin D is needed for normal growth and development of bone in children. Zinc, Vitamin K, and Manganese contribute to the maintenance of normal bones.

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc: Zinc, Vitamin B2, and Vitamin A contribute to the maintenance of normal vision.

heart.title: Liver & Heart
heart.desc: Choline contributes to the maintenance of normal liver function. Vitamin B1 contributes to the normal function of the heart.

product.title: Delicious and
product.description: Delicious liquid formula with natural orange and vanilla flavor that children will love.

flavor.title: Natural Flavor
flavor.desc: Delicious formula with orange and vanilla flavor.

liquid.title: Liquid Formula
liquid.desc: Easy-to-swallow liquid form that children will enjoy consuming.

rich.title: Rich Content
rich.desc: Comprehensive support with more than 20 vitamins and minerals.

science.title: Scientific Formula
science.desc: Content supported by scientific research, complying with the Turkish Food Codex.

ingredients.title: Rich
ingredients.description: Nutritional values per 5 ml (1 scoop) - Nutrient Reference Value percentages (% NRV)
ingredients.nrv_desc: * NRV: Nutrient Reference Value. Turkey (The origin of the main component of the dietary supplement is different from the country of origin of the product.)

usage.title: How to
usage.warning_1: It is not a medicine. It cannot be used for the prevention or treatment of diseases.
usage.warning_2: Dietary supplements cannot replace a normal diet.
usage.warning_3: Do not exceed the recommended daily intake.
usage.warning_4: Keep out of reach of children.
usage.warning_5: Consult your doctor in case of pregnancy and breastfeeding, illness or drug use.

about.title: Generations Growing
about.description: We believe that every family's greatest dream is to see their children grow up healthy and happy. On this path, we work with all our strength to provide the most valuable support to support their healthy development and help them reach their potential.
about.science_desc: Scientific research conducted according to international standards

mission.title: For the Heroes of the Future
mission.content: A hero awaits discovery inside every child. Bravita believes that revealing this potential starts with laying a healthy foundation.

vision.title: From Turkey to the World
vision.content: As a brand born in these lands, we draw our strength from the health needs of our people. We advance with the vision of becoming a brand trusted by families worldwide.

motto.title: Source of Power
motto.content: We provide practical support to your daily diet with the motto "Growth Formula is Here" to stay fit in the hustle and bustle of modern life.

footer.tagline: Liquid Dietary Supplement Containing Multivitamin, Multimineral and Amino Acid.
